channel.title: Dialogues
channel.description: I am coding a 718 server. I want to add a dialogue so that I can use it for a ranging shop. I have added the dialogue and when I compile there is no errors. I try to open the shop with the npc, but it will not open. It says, "Nothing interesting happens." When I clearly know that it is coded in the NPCHandler to open the dialogue and in the dialogue to open with that NPC. I just put the file into another one and it worked perfectly. I believe the problem is that the file is not turning into a .class and therefore it is not working. How do I make it a .class?

item.title: Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @nervo nervo
item.description:
@nervo wrote:

[quote=“i dupe alote, post:3, topic:544384”]Thank you. That fixed it. I have no clue why it did not work before though. Oh well, thank god it works now.[/quote] Hey man glad it works -.- and Good luck with your server!

item.title: Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @i_dupe_alote i dupe alote
item.description:
@i_dupe_alote wrote:

I am coding a 718 server. I want to add a dialogue so that I can use it for a ranging shop. I have added the dialogue and when I compile there is no errors. I try to open the shop with the npc, but it will not open. It says, “Nothing interesting happens.” When I clearly know that it is coded in the NPCHandler to open the dialogue and in the dialogue to open with that NPC. I just put the file into another one and it worked perfectly. I believe the problem is that the file is not turning into a .class and therefore it is not working. How do I make it a .class?
